page.title: 16MEDIA
page.content: The majority of the population in this area are Americans based at RAF Wood- bridge. They watch British TV and some have video recorders. Some of the local population choose not to have television, preferring to make their own entertainment. Among local people there is keen interest in Citizens Band Radio. There is a regional daily newspaper,'The East Anglian Daily Times', which is widely read by locals and some Americans.'The Peninsular' is a small periodical, written, published and distributed every two months, by local people to the residents of its namessake area, a triangle of land bounded roughly by the River Deben, the sea, and a line from Woodbridge in the west to Orford in the East. The USAF base also has a weekly magazine called 'Forum' publishing items of topical interest.
